snippet: The American-led military coalition did not identify the nationality of the victims, but nearly all coalition soldiers in the district where the operation took place are Americans.
abstract: Four coalition soldiers are killed in southern Afghanistan in coalition's worst loss of life in single episode since June 2013.

byline.original: By TAIMOOR SHAH and ROD NORDLAND
byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah reported from Kandahar, and Rod Nordland from Kabul, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: The American-led military coalition did not identify the nationality of the victims, but nearly all coalition soldiers in the district where the operation took place are Americans.
